verbs.description: [ARG1: something eerie] [V: happens] [ARG2: to the bees] [ARGM-TMP: during a total solar eclipse] [ARGM-TMP: during the spectacular event of a total solar eclipse humans emerge blinking from their dens to] enjoy the awe - inspiring show but what of the bees according to new research they stop flying and go completely silent north america solar eclipse candace galen eclipse annals of the entomological society of america oregon summer camp university of missouri bees missouri america idaho
